tag_list: marketing, e-workerscomp-net, web-accesibility, internet-marketing, semantic-web, insurance, workers-compensation
overview:
Ben Kaylor is an expert internet marketer helping to build online resources for businesses in order to deliver information to consumers.

Currently he is working on a Workers Compensation Insurance website for http://www.e-workerscomp.net. Projects involved in marketing this website include web accessibility, semantics and graphic design.

Mr. Kaylor has a vast knowledge about website design and a commitment to pushing the edge on new knowledge and standards to make websites more accessible and information easier to find.
